description.translate: The will vanishes when the ultimate quest of your existence is destroyed.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Vavianth invid\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La volonté s'évanouit quand l'ultime \"}","{\"text\":\"§7quête de votre existence est anéantie.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The will vanishes when the ultimate quest\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of your existence is destroyed.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a4 §7SPD§a2 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
